column5: This is one of those times when I'm basically useless at work. LOL!  25 years ago I discovered a true gem of a brook trout lake. Unfished and teeming with big wild brookies.  I'm leaving in about an hour for the long trek north. It's been about 6 years since I've been, so to say I'm stoked is an understatement.  C'mon 6 O'Clock!!!
Good luck Solo.. Take lots of pics
I'm pretty sure They know that....  have a good one.
looking forward to an epic report upon your return.  the brookies have been biting.
I think they cut a logging road to that lake 3 years ago and it's fished out...    oh wait that was what happened to my secret lake....  good luck
You've gots another hour of waiting..... just so you know    Good luck on your brookie hunt Mike!!!
Thanks boys!  Actually Terry they did cut a road to within 1500m of the lake.  Bill's joining and bringing the ATV so we'll see how she goes.
good luck  ummmm.. what color vehicle do u have an when will u be passing by, just curious, not gonna follow you or anything  hope you have a great time

Ironically we are passing through Chelmsford.  Billy is insisting on taking the Sultan Rd across to 101 to save time. It's definitely not my choice. Over the years I've blown tires on 4 separate occasions on that road.
Have a good trip Mike. Stay safe. Oh, you might want to say your final goodbye to scuro2 now.  Looking forward to your report.
Thanks Roy.  And scuro is just misunderstood that's all.
After fishing them this weekend, I am totally jealous. Good luck
Thanks. And now I'm oficially outta here. See you next week everyone!
Have fun and take a ton of pictures man.
You drive a little red car? Slow down goin past our homes!
Enjoy...nothing more beautiful than a big brookie...maybe a big brown....nah, brookie all the way!!!!!!!
I just got an update from Solo.. He's stuck in traffic on the 400!
:DDamz....im to late to tell him about the Toll through Wawa...ah well...we will get them when they come through!!!
don't forget the new toll in garden river!
we dont go that way anymore
